minecraft:growing_plant_feature.title: behavior.growing_plant_feature (1.21.10)
minecraft:growing_plant_feature.description:
'minecraft:growing_plant_feature' places a growing plant in the world. A growing plant is a column that is anchored either to the ceiling or the floor, based on its growth direction. The growing plant has a body and a head, where the head is the tip of the plant, and the body consists of the remainder blocks.
See https://bedrock.dev/docs/stable/Features#minecraft%3Agrowing_plant_feature

height_distribution.description: Collection of weighted heights that placement will select from.

anyOf.description: Weight used in random selection. Value is relative to other weights in the collection.

growth_direction.description: Direction that the plant grows towards. Valid values: UP and DOWN

age.description: Age of the head of the plant.

body_blocks.description: Collection of weighted block descriptor that placement will select from for the body of the plant.

items.description: Plant body block. Weight used in random selection. Value is relative to other weights in the collection.

head_blocks.description: Collection of weighted block descriptor that placement will select from for the head of the plant.

items.description: Plant head block. Weight used in random selection. Value is relative to other weights in the collection.

allow_water.description: Plant blocks can be placed in water.
